thread.title: Beau A.
thread.title_full: Carousel Checks reviewed by Beau A.

author: Beau A.
title: Beau A.
text: I ordered checks for my business and gave the incorrect information. After I received the checks I noticed they were wrong. I called customer service and they worked with me. They corrected the info and only charged me for shipping. Big mistake on my part and they still solved the issue with no hassle.
